com.epic.autoplayer
Class VideoPlayer

java.lang.Object
  com.epic.autoplayer.VideoPlayer

public class VideoPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

Class responsible for monitoring the playlist queue. Whenever a new URL is added to the playlist, the VideoPlayer will download the video (if not downloaded yet) and execute it using the configured player command line.

Author:
Rodrigo Vargas

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String localCachePath
          Holds the path to where the videos will be downloaded before being displayed.
private  java.lang.String playerCmd
          Holds the command line that executes the video player to display the video.
private  java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> playlist
          Holds the playlist containing URLs of the videos that must be displayed.

          Constructor that receives the queue playlist and the path for the local cache.

          Main method of VideoPlayer class responsible to monitor the playlist queue for URLs of new videos that must be displayed.

Field Detail

playlist

private java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> playlist
Holds the playlist containing URLs of the videos that must be displayed.

localCachePath

private java.lang.String localCachePath
Holds the path to where the videos will be downloaded before being displayed.

playerCmd

private java.lang.String playerCmd
Holds the command line that executes the video player to display the video. The command line must contains all switches required to display the movie in full screen, and make the player exit after the video finishes. The command line must contain <filename> place holder to indicate where in the command line the path to the file to be executed must be inserted. It's default value will execute the VLC video player if present in the environment (vlc -f --play-and-exit <filename>)

Constructor Detail

VideoPlayer

public VideoPlayer(java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> playlist,
                   java.lang.String localCachePath)
Constructor that receives the queue playlist and the path for the local cache.

Parameters:
playlist - Queue of URLs of videos that must be executed.
localCachePath - The path of where the videos are saved locally before being displayed.
Method Detail

play

public void play()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Main method of VideoPlayer class responsible to monitor the playlist queue for URLs of new videos that must be displayed.

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException

setPlayerCmd

public void setPlayerCmd(java.lang.String playerCmd)
Setter method that receives the configuration of the player command line.

Parameters:
playerCmd - The command line that executes the video player to display the video. The command line must contains all switches required to display the movie in full screen, and make the player exit after the video finishes. The command line must contain <filename> place holder to indicate where in the command line the path to the file to be executed must be inserted. It's default value will execute the VLC video player if present in the environment (vlc -f --play-and-exit <filename>)
